thread.title: Watch live: Horizon at Poudre football at 6 p.m.
thread.title_full: Watch live: Horizon at Poudre football at 6 p.m.

title: Watch live: Horizon at Poudre football at 6 p.m.
text:
Watch live: Horizon at Poudre football at 6 p.m. Coloradoan 9:49 a.m. MDT October 22, 2015 JT Erickson and Zach Leal of Poudre High School celebrate after a touchdown against Rocky Mountain during a game at French Field Friday, October 16, 2015. (Photo: Austin Humphreys/The Coloradoan) 1 CONNECT 5 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Thursday is the second-to-last game of the regular season for Class 5A football teams. 
Poudre (3-4, 1-4 Front Range League) hosts conference-leading Horizon (6-1, 5-0 FRL) at 6 p.m. Thursday at French Field. Horizon is looking to secure the Front Range League title. Meanwhile Poudre is on a four-game losing streak and sits firmly on the playoff bubble. 
Fans who can't make it to French Field for the 6 p.m. kickoff can watch the game live right here on Coloradoan.com thanks to our friends at Stream It Sports . Watch live high school football games happening in Fort Collins every Thursday and Friday on Coloradoan.com. Also follow reporter Kevin Lytle for live updates from the game. More Stories
